mapper.select: SELECT `user`.id as id_admin, firstname as admin_firstname, lastname as admin_lastname, patronymic as admin_patronymic, login as admin_login, `password` as admin_password, position as admin_position FROM `user` JOIN `admin` ON `user`.id = `admin`.id_user WHERE login = #{login}

SELECT `user`.id as id_admin, firstname as admin_firstname, lastname as admin_lastname, patronymic as admin_patronymic, login as admin_login, `password` as admin_password, position as admin_position FROM `user` JOIN `admin` ON `user`.id = `admin`.id_user JOIN `session` ON `session`.id_user = `user`.id WHERE uuid = #{uuid}
